hizbs.text: alam aʿhad ilaykum yabani adama an la taʿbudu l-shaytana innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubinun
wa-ani uʿ'buduni hadha siratun mus'taqimun
walaqad adalla minkum jibillan kathiran afalam takunu taʿqiluna
hadhihi jahannamu allati kuntum tuʿaduna
is'lawha l-yawma bima kuntum takfuruna
al-yawma nakhtimu ʿala afwahihim watukallimuna aydihim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanu yaksibuna
walaw nashau latamasna ʿala aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqu l-sirata fa-anna yub'siruna
walaw nashau lamasakhnahum ʿala makanatihim fama is'tataʿu mudiyyan wala yarjiʿuna
waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fi l-khalqi afala yaʿqiluna
wama ʿallamnahu l-shiʿ'ra wama yanbaghi lahu in huwa illa dhik'run waqur'anun mubinun
liyundhira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa l-qawlu ʿala l-kafirina
awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma ʿamilat aydina anʿaman fahum laha malikuna
wadhallalnaha lahum famin'ha rakubuhum wamin'ha yakuluna
walahum fiha manafiʿu wamasharibu afala yashkuruna
wa-ittakhadhu min duni l-lahi alihatan laʿallahum yunsaruna
la yastatiʿuna nasrahum wahum lahum jundun muh'daruna
fala yahzunka qawluhum inna naʿlamu ma yusirruna wama yuʿ'linuna
awalam yara l-insanu anna khalaqnahu min nut'fatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubinun
wadaraba lana mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qala man yuh'yi l-ʿizama wahiya ramimun
qul yuh'yiha alladhi ansha-aha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin ʿalimun
alladhi jaʿala lakum mina l-shajari l-akhdari naran fa-idha antum min'hu tuqiduna
awalaysa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda biqadirin ʿala an yakhluqa mith'lahum bala wahuwa l-khalaqu l-ʿalimu
innama amruhu idha arada shayan an yaqula lahu kun fayakunu
fasub'hana alladhi biyadihi malakutu kulli shayin wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿuna
wal-safati saffan
fal-zajirati zajran
fal-taliyati dhik'ran
inna ilahakum lawahidun
rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma warabbu l-mashariqi
inna zayyanna l-samaa l-dun'ya bizinatin l-kawakibi
wahif'zan min kulli shaytanin maridin
la yassammaʿuna ila l-mala-i l-aʿla wayuq'dhafuna min kulli janibin
duhuran walahum ʿadhabun wasibun
illa man khatifa l-khatfata fa-atbaʿahu shihabun thaqibun
fa-is'taftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqna inna khalaqnahum min tinin lazibin
bal ʿajib'ta wayaskharuna
wa-idha dhukkiru la yadhkuruna
wa-idha ra-aw ayatan yastaskhiruna
waqalu in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban waʿizaman a-inna lamabʿuthuna
awaabauna l-awaluna
qul naʿam wa-antum dakhiruna
fa-innama hiya zajratun wahidatun fa-idha hum yanzuruna
waqalu yawaylana hadha yawmu l-dini
hadha yawmu l-fasli alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
